##Version of file includes new variables (for repeat takers, chiefexec)

##keep observations only from the last year that org members completed the BSA. 

BSA_oporg <- BSA_past18.7%>%
  group_by(Org_Name)%>%
  slice_max(survey_year2)%>%
  ungroup()
